data.enText: to prepare and use land for growing plants or crops

data.chText: 这一带的土地从未开垦过。
data.enText: The land around here has never been cultivated.

data.chText: 这里的人们主要种植稻子和豆类。
data.enText: The people cultivate mainly rice and beans.

data.chText: 建立（友谊）；结交（朋友）；获得（支持）
data.enText: to try to get sb's friendship or support

data.chText: 他特意设法与新闻界搞好关系。
data.enText: He purposely tried to cultivate good relations with the press.

data.chText: 主动结交当地人大有好处。
data.enText: It helps if you go out of your way to cultivate the local people.

data.chText: 逐渐形成（某种态度、谈话或举止方式等）
data.enText: to develop an attitude, a way of talking or behaving, etc.

data.chText: 她养成了一派精明练达的气度。
data.enText: She cultivated an air of sophistication.

simple_means.memory_skill: cult 耕种；培养 + iv 有…性质的 + ate 使… → 耕作；培养

tr: adapt (a wild plant or unclaimed land) to the environment
teach or refine to be discriminative in taste or judgment
example: She is well schooled in poetry

value.def: If you cultivate land or crops, you prepare land and grow crops on it.

example.ex: She also cultivated a small garden of her own.
example.tran: 她还耕种了一片属于自己的小园子。
为数不多的几小块耕地

example.ex: Farmers with many acres under cultivation profited.
example.tran: 耕种大片土地的农场主挣了钱。

value.def: If you cultivate an attitude, image, or skill, you try hard to develop it and make it stronger or better.

example.ex: He has written eight books and has cultivated the image of an elder statesman...
example.tran: 他已经写了8本书，树立起了其政界元老的形象。

example.ex: Cultivating a positive mental attitude towards yourself can reap tremendous benefits.
example.tran: 培养一种自信的积极心态会让人受益匪浅。

value.tran: 逐渐形成，培养(某种态度、形象或技能)

example.ex: ...the cultivation of a positive approach to life and health.
example.tran: 培养积极的生活方式和保健方式

value.def: If you cultivate someone or cultivate a friendship with them, you try hard to develop a friendship with them.

example.ex: Howe carefully cultivated Daniel C. Roper, the Assistant Postmaster General...
example.tran: 豪谨慎地和邮政副部长丹尼尔·C.罗珀拉近关系。

example.ex: Estonia has done much to cultivate the friendship of western European countries.
example.tran: 爱沙尼亚努力发展与西欧国家的友谊。

rootsaffixes.indicate: = to till, to raise 耕种；培养
rootsaffixes.title: cult

partsOfSpeech.dec: aqui〔= aqu 水〕+ cult 耕种；培养 + ure 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 水产养殖
arbori 树木 + cult 耕种；培养 + ure 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 树木栽培
cult 耕种；培养 →〔精神世界的〕培养 → 教派
cult 耕种；培养 + iv 有…性质的 + ate 使… → 耕作；培养
cult 耕种；培养 + ure 表行为 →〔对心灵的〕培养 → 文化
flori 花 + cult 耕种；培养 + ure 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 花卉栽培
horti 花园 + cult 耕种；培养 + ure 行为，行为的结果，与行为有关之物 → 园艺；园艺学
in 无 + cult 耕种；培养 → （土地）未耕种的
